price: 46. (Al-lah) les dijo: «No temáis. Yo estaré con vosotros escuchándolo y observándolo (todo).
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
